pizza.name: Pizza!
pizza.description:
Increases the following stats:

<g>Max health</c> by <g>15% <c_stack>(+15% per stack).</c>
<g>Health regeneration</c> by <g>3</c> <c_stack>(+3 per stack)</c> <g>HP</c> per second.
<g>Armor</c> by <g>14 <c_stack>(+14 per stack).</c>
<y>Damage</c> by <y>15%</c> <c_stack>(+15% per stack).</c>
<y>Attack speed</c> by <y>25% <c_stack>(+25% per stack).</c>
<y>Critical strike chance</c> by <y>15% <c_stack>(+15% per stack).</c>
<b>Movement speed</c> by <b>28% <c_stack>(+28% per stack).</c>
<b>Jump height</c> by <b>25% <c_stack>(+25% per stack).</c>
<b>Equipment cooldown reduction</c> by <b>12% <c_stack>(+12% per stack).</c>
pizza.story: It's PIZZA time! 30 years or it's FREE! FREE I SAID YES FREE!

backupMissiles.name: Backup Missiles
backupMissiles.description: Shoot <y>3<c/> <c_stack>(+1 per stack)</c> <y>small missiles for 3x80% damage</c> every time an enemy spawns.
backupMissiles.story: Don't say we sent you these, we already had enough trouble with the UES Contact Light getting them in, we don't want the authorities behind us now.

knockupFin.name: Knockup Fin
knockupFin.description: <y>10% chance</c> to knock enemies into the air and then slam them to the ground, <y>stunning</c> and dealing <y>50%</c> <c_stack>(+50% per stack)</c> <y>base damage</c>.
knockupFin.destination:
Cage 255,
Preservation Center,
The Big Dipper
knockupFin.story:
I'm sorry, we couldn't perform a succesful surgery, big guy couldn't handle the stress. 
Here, i remember you said you loved his fins, we are sending them back to you, it's the only part that remained untouched. 
Take Care.

siphoningVase.name: Siphoning Vase
siphoningVase.description: <y>Tether</c> to the nearest <y>1</c> <c_stack>(+1 per stack)</c> enemies, dealing <y>100% damage</c> and <g>healing for 2.5% of your maximum health</c>.
siphoningVase.story:
Yo! How has it been going? I'm doing fantastic! I've never felt better in my entire life before, and I found a super cool artifact we could research together! 
It's a weird vase, that has some tar inside, it moves! Although, can't say the same about Cheryl...
She passed out a bit earlier, right now I'm nursing her, thank God Doc gave us these potions! 
Anyways, take care and see you later!

amberMosquito.name: Amber Mosquito
amberMosquito.description: Reduces enemies' <g>maximum health</c> by <g>25%</c> <c_stack>(+10% per stack)</c>.
amberMosquito.destination:
Museum of Prehistory,
New Orleans,
Earth
amberMosquito.story: Now look at this BEAUTY! Imagine the kind of dinosaur DNA we could get from this! a T-Rex, or a Stegosaurus! or even a Triceratops! anyways, here you go alongside some testing tubes, this is gonna be GROUNDBREAKING!
